original_title: 平野綾1st LIVE 2008 RIOT TOUR LIVE DVD
overview: "Hirano Aya 1st LIVE 2008 RIOT TOUR LIVE DVD" is the first music DVD released by Hirano Aya. It also featured making footages in Tokyo, Osaka, Nagoya and Yokohama cities and a special multi-angle video.
tagline: Hirano Aya 1st LIVE 2008 RIOT TOUR LIVE DVD
title: Hirano Aya 1st LIVE 2008 RIOT TOUR LIVE DVD
